above.contents: These plugins can be activated once you have installed Saltcorn. Plugins give you new data types, new views and themes.
Packs are pre-built tables, views and pages you can install for instant functionality.

above.contents: This is the wiki for saltcorn, an open source extensible no-code application builder. The wiki itself is built on saltcorn! You can contribute to the wiki by creating an account.

Links

  • Main Website
  • GitHub Repository
  • Bug Reports and Feedback
  • Forum
  • Saltcorn Blog
  • Roadmap

contents.contents: Widgets so spiffy you'll be done in a jiffy

above.contents: In the widget business, we're the cream of the crop

Our widgets are some of the finest ever produced. With our widgets you will be:

  • Spick and span in no time
  • Covered by our exclusive ValueBack Guarantee
  • Joining thousands of widget intermediaries in trusting WidgetCo
  • Look really good in front of your most suggestible clients
  • if you are still reading this, you must be desperate for widgets. We will not let you down
Don't miss out on the best in widgets

besides.contents: "Thank you thank you thank you thank you thank you thank you thank you"
"I was nearly done for in the widget business, until I found WidgetCo. The X-514 turned my life around"
